title: BRIEF-India Cenbank Governor Says Q2 Growth Numbers Will Hopefully Be Better Than Q1- India Today Conclave
text:
© Reuters. BRIEF-India Cenbank Governor Says Q2 Growth Numbers Will Hopefully Be Better Than Q1- India Today Conclave

Sept 20 (Reuters) - RBI Governor Shaktikanta Das speaking at India Today Conclave Says:

* GOVERNMENT HAS TO USE FISCAL TOOL AND FOCUS ON QUALITY OF EXPENDITUTE

* OUR INFLATION TARGET IS 4%, THAT SHOULD BE OUR GUIDING LEVEL ON RATES

* Q2 GROWTH NUMBERS WILL HOPEFULLY BE BETTER THAN Q1

* ROOM FOR FURTHER IMPROVEMENT IN LAND AND LABOUR REFORMS

* NEW GOVERNMENT MEASURES "VERY BOLD" AND WELCOME

* NEW GOVERNMENT MEASURES HIGHLY POSITIVE FOR THE ECONOMY

* REDUCTION IN CORPORATE TAX RATE WILL AUGUR WELL FOR OUR ECONOMY

* MARKET IS PUNISHING BAD NBFCS WHERE THERE HAVE BEEN GOVERNANCE FAILURE

* NBFC PROMOTERS WILL HAVE TO TAKE BIGGER HAIRCUTS WHEN THERE IS A FAILURE

* THERE IS DIFFERENCE OF OPINION BETWEEN GOVERNMENT AND RBI BUT IT IS DISCUSSED INTERNALLY

* RBI GOVERNOR SAYS CRITICAL TO ENSURE BANK MERGER TRANSITION HAPPENS IN A NON-DISRUPTIVE MANNER
description: BRIEF-India Cenbank Governor Says Q2 Growth Numbers Will Hopefully Be Better Than Q1- India Today Conclave
